Description:
Detects PowerShell command line contents that include a suspicious abnormal casing in the Net.Webclient (e.g. nEt.WEbCliEnT) string as used in obfuscation techniques

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Net WebClient Casing Anomalies
Query: sourcetype="windows-sysmon" (command="*TgBlAFQALgB3AEUAQg*" OR command="*4AZQBUAC4AdwBFAEIA*" OR command="*OAGUAVAAuAHcARQBCA*" OR command="*bgBFAHQALgB3AGUAYg*" OR command="*4ARQB0AC4AdwBlAGIA*" OR command="*uAEUAdAAuAHcAZQBiA*" OR command="*TgBFAHQALgB3AGUAYg*" OR command="*OAEUAdAAuAHcAZQBiA*" OR command="*bgBlAFQALgB3AGUAYg*" OR command="*4AZQBUAC4AdwBlAGIA*"
